actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to create a National Commission on Compulsive Gambling.
short_title: National Commission on Compulsive Gambling Act

summary.text: National Commission on Compulsive Gambling Act - Establishes a 22-member, part-time National Commission on Compulsive Gambling to conduct a study of compulsive gambling and related problems, including specified assessments. Directs the Commission to submit a final report to the President and Congress within one year of the availability of funds for such purpose.

titles.title: National Commission on Compulsive Gambling Act
A bill to create a National Commission on Compulsive Gambling.
